entries.name: Age
entries: Aarakocra reach maturity by age 3. Compared to humans, aarakocra don't usually live longer than 30 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most aarakocra are good and rarely choose sides when it comes to law and chaos. Tribal leaders and warriors might be lawful, while explorers and adventurers might tend toward chaotic

entries.name: Size
entries: Aarakocra are about 5 feet tall. They have thin, lightweight bodies that weigh between 80 and 100 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Flight
entries: You have a flying speed of 50 feet. To use this speed, you can't be wearing medium or heavy armor.

entries.name: Talons
entries: You are proficient with your unarmed strikes, which deal 1d4 slashing damage on a hit.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Aarakocra, and Auran.

entries.name: Age
entries: Genasi mature at about the same rate as humans and reach adulthood in their late teens. They live somewhat longer than humans do, up to 120 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Independent and self-reliant, genasi tend toward a neutral alignment.

entries.name: Size
entries: Genasi are as varied as their mortal parents but are generally built like humans, standing anywhere from 5 feet to over 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Primordial. Primordial is a guttural language, filled with harsh syllables and hard consonants.

entries.name: Unending Breath
entries: You can hold your breath indefinitely while you're not {@condition incapacitated}.

entries.name: Mingle with the Wind
entries: You can cast the {@spell levitate} spell once with this trait, requiring no material components, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

entries.name: Earth Walk
entries: You can move across difficult terrain made of earth or stone without expending extra movement.

entries.name: Merge with Stone
entries: You can cast the {@spell pass without trace} spell once with this trait, requiring no material components, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. Your ties to the Elemental Plane of Fire make your darkvision unusual: everything you see in darkness is in a shade of red.

entries.name: Fire Resistance
entries: You have resistance to fire damage.

entries.name: Reach to the Blaze
entries: You know the {@spell produce flame} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell burning hands} spell once with this trait as a 1st-level spell, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Acid Resistance
entries: You have resistance to acid damage.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Swim
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Call to the Wave
entries: You know the {@spell shape water|xge} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell create or destroy water} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 雖然精靈身體的成長速度跟人類差不多，但精靈的成年標準包含人生經驗的成長，而不單看肉體。精靈通常在 100 歲左右進行成人禮及獲得成年的名字，並可以活750 年

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 精靈喜愛自由、多樣性、自我表逹，因此強烈傾向於混亂中溫和的一面。他們珍視自己以及他人的自由，因此一般是善良的。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 精靈 5 到 6 尺高，身形苗條。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 敏銳感覺[Keen Senses]
entries: 你熟練於觀察[Perception]技能。

entries.name: 妖精先祖[Fey Ancestry]
entries: 你在進行對{@condition 迷惑[charmed]}的豁免檢定時有優勢，而且魔法不能使你陷入睡眠。

entries.name: 冥想[Trance]
entries: 精靈不需要睡覺。取而代之，他們每天要進行四小時的深層冥想，其中會做夢。這些夢其實是經年累月培養出來的直覺式心靈訓練。
{@note 如果你在長休時冥想，你只需要4個小時就能完成。此外，你仍需遵守長休的規則;只有持續時間改變了。}

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你能說、讀、寫通用語[Common]和精靈語[Elvish]。

entries.name: 高等黑暗視覺[Superior Darkvision]
entries: 120 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 日光敏感[Sunlight Sensitivity]
entries: 如果你本人，你要攻擊的目標，或者你試圖察覺到的東西位於陽光直射下，你在攻擊檢定和感知（觀察）檢定上獲得劣勢。

entries.name: 卓爾魔法[Drow Magic]
entries: 你掌握了 {@spell 舞光[Dancing Lights]} 戲法。 當你達到3級，你可以使用{@spell 妖火[Faerie Fire]}，每日一次。當你達到5級，你可以使用{@spell 黑暗[Darkness]}，每日一次。這些法術的關鍵施法屬性是魅力。

entries.name: 卓爾武器訓練[Drow Weapon Training]
entries: 你熟練於細劍[rapiers]，短劍[shortswords]和手弩[hand crossbows]。

entries.name: Elf Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item longsword|phb}, {@item shortsword|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb}, and {@item longbow|phb}.

entries.name: Fey Step
entries: You can cast the {@spell misty step} spell once using this trait. You regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: 精靈武器訓練[Elf Weapon Training]
entries: 你熟練於使用{@item 長劍[longsword]|phb}、{@item 短劍[shortsword]|phb}、{@item 短弓[shortbow]|phb}、{@item 長弓[longbow]|phb}。

entries.name: 戲法[Cantrip]
entries: 你懂得一項 {@filter 自選的法師戲法|spells|level=0|class=Wizard}。你用智力作為它的魔法能力值。

entries.name: 額外語言[Extra Language]
entries: 你能說、讀、寫一項額外的自選語言。

entries.name: 精靈武器訓練[Elf Weapon Training]
entries: 你熟練於使用{@item 長劍[longsword]|phb}、{@item 短劍[shortsword]|phb}、{@item 短弓[shortbow]|phb}、{@item 長弓[longbow]|phb}。

entries.name: 輕快腳步[Fleet of Foot]
entries: 你基礎速度增加到 35 尺。

entries.name: 以天為屏
entries: 當你因植物、大雨、飄雪、薄霧等自然現像獲得輕度遮蔽時，你可以嘗試躲藏。

entries.name: Fey Step
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Shifting Seasons
entries: At the end of each short or long rest, you can align yourself with the magic of one season, regardless of the season that is dominating your personality. Doing so allows you to cast a certain cantrip, as shown in the Shifting Seasons Cantrips table. When you align yourself with a season's magic, you lose the cantrip associated with the previous season and gain the cantrip associated with the new season.
Your spellcasting ability for these cantrips is Intelligence or Charisma, whichever is higher.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Auran.

entries.name: Flight
entries: You have a flying speed of 30 feet. To use this speed, you can't be wearing medium or heavy armor.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Sylvan, Elvish, and one extra language of your choice. Elvish is fluid, with subtle intonations and intricate grammar. Elven literature is rich and varied, and their songs and poems are famous among other races. Many bards learn their language so they can add Elvish ballads to their repertoires.

entries.name: Grugach Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the spear, shortbow, longbow, and net.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the druid spell list. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Aquan.

entries.name: Sea Elf Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item spear|phb}, {@item trident|phb}, {@item light crossbow|phb}, and {@item net|phb}.

entries.name: Child of the Sea
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet, and you can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Friend of the Sea
entries: Using gestures and sounds, you can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts that have an inborn swimming speed.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Elvish, and one extra language of your choice. Elvish is fluid, with subtle intonations and intricate grammar. Elven literature is rich and varied, and their songs and poems are famous among other races. Many bards learn their language so they can add Elvish ballads to their repertoires.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one of the following cantrips of your choice: {@spell chill touch}, {@spell spare the dying}, or {@spell thaumaturgy}. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Blessing of the Raven Queen
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space you can see, and you gain resistance to all damage until the start of your next turn. During that time, you appear ghostly and translucent. Once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

subraces.name: Eladrin
entries: {@i Choose your eladrin's season: autumn, winter, spring, or summer. When finishing a long rest, any eladrin can change their season. See the "Info" tab for more information.}

entries.name: Fey Step
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
When you reach 3rd level, your Fey Step gains an additional effect based on your season; if the effect requires a saving throw, the DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier:

items.name: Autumn
items.entry: Immediately after you use your Fey Step, up to two creatures of your choice that you can see within 10 feet of you must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for 1 minute, or until you or your companions deal any damage to it.

items.name: Winter
items.entry: When you use your Fey Step, one creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of you before you teleport must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of you until the end of your next turn.

items.name: Spring
items.entry: When you use your Fey Step, you can touch one willing creature within 5 feet of you. That creature then teleports instead of you, appearing in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within 30 feet of you.

items.name: Summer
items.entry: Immediately after you use your Fey Step, each creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of you takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1 damage).

entries.name: Sea Elf Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item spear|phb}, {@item trident|phb}, {@item light crossbow|phb}, and {@item net|phb}.

entries.name: Child of the Sea
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet, and you can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Friend of the Sea
entries: Using gestures and sounds, you can communicate simple ideas with any beast that has an innate swimming speed.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Aquan.

entries.name: Necrotic Resistance
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

entries.name: Blessing of the Raven Queen
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

Starting at 3rd level, you also gain resistance to all damage when you teleport using this trait. The resistance lasts until the start of your next turn. During that time, you appear ghostly and translucent.

entries.name: Aereni Proficiency
entries: An Aereni elf can choose one skill or tool proficiency. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses this chosen proficiency.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choosing.

entries.name: Valenar Proficiency
entries: A Valenar elf gains proficiency with the {@item scimitar|phb}, {@item Double-Bladed Scimitar|uawge|double scimitar}, {@item longbow|phb}, and {@item shortbow|phb}.

entries.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: 以天為屏[Mask of the Wild]
entries: 當你因植物、大雨、飄雪、薄霧等自然現像獲得輕度遮蔽時，你可以嘗試躲藏。

entries.name: Natural Talent
entries: You gain proficiency with one musical instrument or the Performance skill.

entries.name: Gift of the Shadows
entries: When you make a Charisma (Performance) or Dexterity (Stealth) check, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Shape Shadows
entries: You know the {@spell minor illusion} cantrip. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this trait.

entries.name: Slip Into Shadow
entries: You can use the Hide action as a bonus action, even if you have no cover or if you're under observation. Regardless of whether you succeed or fail, once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Age
entries: Although elves reach physical maturity at about the same age as humans, the elven understanding of adulthood goes beyond physical growth to encompass worldly experience. An elf typically claims adulthood and an adult name around the age of 100 and can live to be 750 years old.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Elves love freedom, variety, and self-expression, so they lean strongly toward the gentler aspects of chaos. They value and protect others' freedom as well as their own, and they are more often good than not.

entries.name: Size
entries: Elves range from under 5 to over 6 feet tall and have slender builds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Keen Senses
entries: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

entries.name: 妖精先祖[Fey Ancestry]
entries: 你在進行對{@condition 迷惑[charmed]}的豁免檢定時有優勢，而且魔法不能使你陷入睡眠。

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Elvish. Elvish is fluid, with subtle intonations and intricate grammar. Elven literature is rich and varied, and their songs and poems are famous among other races. Many bards learn their language so they can add Elvish ballads to their repertoires.

entries.name: 以天為屏[Mask of the Wild]
entries: 當你因植物、大雨、飄雪、薄霧等自然現像獲得輕度遮蔽時，你可以嘗試躲藏。

entries.name: Elf Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

entries.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Your ground speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: Mul Daya Magic
entries: You know the {@spell chill touch} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell hex} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell darkness} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: Your Darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

entries.name: Elf Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

entries.name: Skill Versatility
entries: You have proficiency with any combination of two other skills or tools of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Although elves reach physical maturity at about the same age as humans, the elven understanding of adulthood goes beyond physical growth to encompass worldly experience. An elf typically claims adulthood and an adult name around the age of 100 and can live to be 750 years old.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Elves love freedom, variety, and self-expression, so they lean strongly toward the gentler aspects of chaos. They value and protect others' freedom as well as their own, and they are more often good than not.

entries.name: Size
entries: Elves range from under 5 to over 6 feet tall and have slender builds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Keen Senses
entries: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

entries.name: Elf Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

entries.name: 妖精先祖[Fey Ancestry]
entries: 你在進行對{@condition 迷惑[charmed]}的豁免檢定時有優勢，而且魔法不能使你陷入睡眠。

entries.name: 冥想[Trance]
entries: 精靈不需要睡覺。取而代之，他們每天要進行四小時的深層冥想，其中會做夢。這些夢其實是經年累月培養出來的直覺式心靈訓練。
{@note 如果你在長休時冥想，你只需要4個小時就能完成。此外，你仍需遵守長休的規則;只有持續時間改變了。}

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Elvish. Elvish is fluid, with subtle intonations and intricate grammar. Elven literature is rich and varied, and their songs and poems are famous among other races. Many bards learn their language so they can add Elvish ballads to their repertoires.

entries.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Your ground speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: 以天為屏[Mask of the Wild]
entries: 當你因植物、大雨、飄雪、薄霧等自然現像獲得輕度遮蔽時，你可以嘗試躲藏。

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choosing.

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 地侏成年的速率與人類相同，大多數的地侏預計在40歲左右定居並像成人一樣生活。他們能活到350到接近500歲。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 地侏大多數是善良的。賢者、工程師、研究者、學者、調查者或發明家傾向於守序。那些吟游詩人、騙徒、流浪漢或是喜歡空想的珠寶匠傾向於混亂。地侏是心地善良的，甚至那些他們中間的騙徒也多數是玩笑性質的而不是惡毒的。

entries.name: 體型[Size]
entries: 地侏平均在3~4呎高，約40磅。體型為小型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 地侏狡黠[Gnome Cunning]
entries: 你對所有對抗魔法的智力，感知和魅力的豁免檢定有優勢。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能聽說讀寫通用語[Common]與地侏語[Gnomish]。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 地底地侏對地侏來說生命是短暫的。它們的成熟速度和人類一樣，25歲時被認為是成年的。他們可以活 200 到 250 年，儘管幽暗地域[Underdark]艱苦的勞動和危險經常使他們在壽命到達之前就奪走了性命。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 地底地侏相信生存靠的是避免與其他生物糾纏，而不是樹敵，所以它們喜歡中立的陣營。他們很少希望別人生病，也不太可能為了別人而冒險。

entries.name: 體型[Size]
entries: 一個典型的地底侏侏站3 - 3½英尺高,體重80到120磅。你的尺寸是小的。

entries.name: 高等黑暗視覺[Superior Darkvision]
entries: 120 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 岩石偽裝[Stone Camouflage]
entries: 當你嘗試在巖石地形中躲藏時，你的敏捷（隱匿）檢定獲得優勢。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你可以說，讀，寫通用語[Common]、地侏語[Gnomish]、地底通用語[Undercommon]。

entries.name: 天生幻術師[Natural Illusionist]
entries: 你懂得 {@spell 小幻象[Minor Illusion]}。相關魔法能力值是智力。

entries.name: 動物溝通[Speak with Small Beasts]
entries: 通過聲音和手勢，你能和小型或更小的野獸簡單溝通。林地侏喜愛動物，而且經常喂養松鼠、獾、兔子、鼴鼠，啄木鳥等作為他們的心愛的寵物。

entries.name: 工匠知識[Artificer's Lore]
entries: 當你進行關於魔法物品，煉金物品或是工藝元件的智力（歷史）檢定時，你可以加上兩倍的熟練加值來代替原有的熟練加值。

entries.name: 修補匠[Tinker]
entries: 你熟練於匠人工具（修補工具）。用這些工具，你能用1小時時間和10金幣價值的材料來創造一個超小型的發條機械裝置（AC5,1hp）。這個裝置在24小時後停止運轉（除非你花1小時來修理它，讓它保持運行），或者當你用動作來取消它，這時你能收回用來制造它的材料。同一時間你最多能激活3個這樣的裝置。
當你製造這個裝置時，選擇下列選項之一：

entries.name: 發條玩具 [Clockwork Toy]
entries: 這玩具可以是個機械的動物、怪物或人，例如青蛙、老鼠、鳥、龍或者士兵。當被放在地上時，這個玩具能在你的行動輪內隨機向一個方向移動5尺，玩具發出噪聲用來表現它模擬生物的叫聲。

entries.name: 打火機[Fire Starter]
entries: 這個裝置用產生微小的火焰，你可以用來點蠟燭，火炬或營火。使用裝置需要動作。

entries.name: 音樂盒[Music Box]
entries: 當打開時，這個音樂盒以適中的音量奏響固定的一首的歌曲。當音樂播放完或者音樂盒被關閉時，便會停止。

entries.name: Age
entries: Deep gnomes are short-lived for gnomes. They mature at the same rate humans do and are considered full-grown adults by 25. They live 200 to 250 years, although hard toil and the dangers of the Underdark often claim them before their time.

entries.name: Size
entries: Unlike other gnomes, svirfneblin tend to weigh 80 to 120 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Svirfneblin believe that survival depends on avoiding entanglements with other creatures and not making enemies, so they favor neutral alignments. They rarely wish others ill, and they are unlikely to take risks on behalf of others, except those dearest to them.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: 120 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Gnomish, and Undercommon.

entries.name: Gifted Scribe
entries: You are proficient with {@item calligrapher's supplies|phb} and {@item forgery kit|phb|forgery kits}. When you make an ability check using either one of these tools, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Scribe's Insight
entries: You can cast {@spell comprehend languages} once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Whispering Wind
entries: You know the cantrip {@spell message}. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability when casting it.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 年幼的龍裔成長速度很快，在孵化後幾小時後就可以行走。在3歲的時候就達到了人類10歲兒童的體型和發育水平，15歲成年，平均活到80歲。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 龍裔的陣營趨於極端化，在善與惡之間無盡的戰爭中作出有意識的選擇（分別通過代表巴哈姆特[Bahamut]或是提亞馬特[Tiamat]）。絕大多數龍裔是善良的，但是那些選擇支持提亞馬特的龍裔會是可怕的惡棍。

entries.name: 體型[Size]
entries: 龍裔比人類更高更重，站立時超過6英尺，平均250磅重。中體型。

entries.name: 龍族血統[Draconic Ancestry]
entries: 你擁有巨龍的血統。在龍族血統表中選擇一個龍類。你的噴吐武器和傷害抗性由所選擇的龍的種類所決定，如表所示。

entries.name: 噴吐武器[Breath Weapon]
entries: 你能夠用行動來呼出破壞性的能量，你的龍族血統決定了吐息的范圍、形狀和傷害類型。
當你使用你的噴吐武器，吐息范圍內的每一個生物都必須做一次豁免檢定，豁免的類型取決於你的龍族血統。這次豁免的DC=8+你的體質調整值+你的熟練加值。如果豁免失敗，這個生物將會受到2d6點傷害，成功的話則半傷。在6級時傷害增加到3d6，在11級增加到4d6，16級增加到5d6。
當你使用過噴吐武器後，必須經過一次長休息或短休息後才能再次使用它。

entries.name: 傷害抵抗[Damage Resistance]
entries: 你的龍族血統給你帶來了相應的傷害類型的抗性。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你可以說、讀、寫通用語[Common]和龍語[Draconic]。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 哥利亞的壽命跟人類的差不多。他們在17,18歲時進入成人階段，他們通常活不過一個世紀。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 哥利亞的社會非常講究職責跟任務，非常守序的社會。他們對公平的競爭還有自我約束跟自力救濟讓他們偏向中立的個性。

entries.name: 體型[Size]
entries: 哥利亞差不多在7或8呎左右，體重大約280磅至340磅。你的身型是中型。

entries.name: 運動天才[Natural Athlete]
entries: 你熟練於運動[Athletics]技能。

entries.name: 如石般的耐力[Stone's Endurance]
entries: 你可以專注你自己來減輕痛覺。你可以用你的反應行動來骰 d12 。將你的體魄調整值加上值骰的結果，這總數可以用來減免所受到的傷害。當你使用這特性後，你必須在短修或長修後才能再次使用。​

entries.name: 強壯身軀[Powerful Build]
entries: 計算負重、推、提的時候你的身型算為大一號。

entries.name: 出生於山[Mountain Born]
entries: 你已習慣在高海拔的環境，20,000呎(6100公尺)海拔。你也習慣在寒冷的天氣裡生活。可以看DM手冊第5章。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你會說、讀、寫通用語[Common]跟巨人語[Giant]。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 半精靈成長的速度和人類一樣，在20歲左右成年。但他們的壽命遠比人類要長，經常能活到180歲以上。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 半精靈繼承了他們精靈血統中的混亂傾向。他們十分重視個人自由和創造性的表達，不愛做領導者也不希望被人追隨。他們不在乎規則，討厭被別人命令，而且有時會顯得十分不可靠——或者至少是難以預測。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 半精靈的體形和人類差不多，身高在5英尺到6英尺之間。你是中體型生物。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 妖精先祖[Fey Ancestry]
entries: 你在進行對{@condition 迷惑[charmed]}的豁免檢定時有優勢，而且魔法不能使你陷入睡眠。

entries.name: 多才多藝[Skill Versatility]
entries: 選擇兩個技能，並對這兩個技能獲得熟練。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你可以說、讀、寫通用語[Common]和精靈語[Elvish]，以及你選擇的一項語言。

entries.name: 多才多藝[Skill Versatility]
entries: 選擇兩個技能，並對這兩個技能獲得熟練。

entries.name: 敏銳感覺[Keen Senses]
entries: 你熟練於觀察[Perception]技能。

entries.name: 精靈武器訓練[Elf Weapon Training]
entries: 你熟練於使用{@item 長劍[longsword]|phb}、{@item 短劍[shortsword]|phb}、{@item 短弓[shortbow]|phb}、{@item 長弓[longbow]|phb}。

entries.name: 輕快腳步[Fleet of Foot]
entries: 你基礎速度增加到 35 尺。

entries.name: 以天為屏[Mask of the Wild]
entries: 當你因植物、大雨、飄雪、薄霧等自然現像獲得輕度遮蔽時，你可以嘗試躲藏。

subraces.name: 月精靈或日光精靈後裔[Moon Elf or Sun Elf Descent]

entries.name: 多才多藝[Skill Versatility]
entries: 選擇兩個技能，並對這兩個技能獲得熟練。

entries.name: 敏銳感覺[Keen Senses]
entries: 你熟練於觀察[Perception]技能。

entries.name: 精靈武器訓練[Elf Weapon Training]
entries: 你熟練於使用{@item 長劍[longsword]|phb}、{@item 短劍[shortsword]|phb}、{@item 短弓[shortbow]|phb}、{@item 長弓[longbow]|phb}。

entries.name: 戲法[Cantrip]
entries: 你懂得一項 {@filter 自選的法師戲法|spells|level=0|class=Wizard}。你用智力作為它的魔法能力值。

entries.name: 多才多藝[Skill Versatility]
entries: 選擇兩個技能，並對這兩個技能獲得熟練。

entries.name: 敏銳感覺[Keen Senses]
entries: 你熟練於觀察[Perception]技能。

entries.name: 卓爾魔法[Drow Magic]
entries: 你掌握了 {@spell 舞光[Dancing Lights]} 戲法。 當你達到3級，你可以使用{@spell 妖火[Faerie Fire]}，每日一次。當你達到5級，你可以使用{@spell 黑暗[Darkness]}，每日一次。這些法術的關鍵施法屬性是魅力。

entries.name: 多才多藝[Skill Versatility]
entries: 選擇兩個技能，並對這兩個技能獲得熟練。

entries.name: 敏銳感覺[Keen Senses]
entries: 你熟練於觀察[Perception]技能。

entries.name: 游泳[Swim]
entries: 你獲得30呎的游泳速度。

entries.name: Deductive Intuition
entries: When you make an Intelligence (Investigation) or Wisdom (Insight) check, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Sense Threats
entries: You can cast the {@spell detect magic} and {@spell detect poison and disease} spells, but only as rituals. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Elvish.

entries.name: Sea Monkey
entries: Your base walking speed is 30 feet, and you have a swim speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Windwright's Intuition
entries: When you make a Dexterity (Acrobatics) check or any ability check involving operating or maintaining a water or air vehicle, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Storm's Blessing
entries: You have resistance to lightning damage.

entries.name: Headwinds
entries: You know the {@spell gust|xge} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell gust of wind} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Elvish.

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 半獸人比人類更快地成熟，在14歲左右便成年。他們的衰老明顯而快速，很少有能夠活得超過75歲。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 半獸人從他們的獸人先輩處繼承了容易傾向於混亂和極少傾向於善良的血統。在獸人中成長並願意生活在其中的半獸人通常是邪惡的。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 半獸人比人類更大更壯，他們的身高范圍在5英尺到超過6英尺。你的體形為中型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 凶惡[Menacing]
entries: 你獲得威嚇[Intimidation]技能的熟練。

entries.name: 殘暴耐性[Relentless Endurance]
entries: 當你的HP降為0而沒有完全死亡時，你可以改為使HP降低到1。直到你完成一次長休息前你不能再使用該能力。

entries.name: 野蠻攻擊[Savage Attacks]
entries: 當你用近戰武器攻擊造成重擊，你可以額外骰一個該武器的傷害骰並將數值加入到重擊的額外傷害中。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你可以聽說讀寫通用語[Common]和獸人語[Orc]。獸人語是使用輔音的一種粗糙而難聽的語言。獸人語沒有自己的文字，使用矮人語進行書寫。

entries.name: Hunter's Intuition
entries: Your mark sharpens your senses and helps you find your prey. When you make a Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Survival) check, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Imprint Prey
entries: As a bonus action, choose one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The target is imprinted in your mind until it dies or you use this trait again. Alternatively, you can imprint a creature as your quarry whenever you succeed on a Wisdom (Survival) check to track it. When tracking your quarry, double the result of your Intuition die. When your quarry is within 60 feet of you, you have a sense of its location: it can't be hidden from you, gains no benefit from invisibility, and your attacks against it ignore half cover. Once you use this trait, you cannot use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Nature's Voice
entries: When you reach 3rd level you gain the ability to cast {@spell locate animals or plants}, but only as a ritual.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 矮人的成長速度跟人類差不多，不過直到 50 歲之前都被視為未成年。他們平均能活 350 年。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 矮人大都是守序的，堅信井然有序的社會對大家都好。他們也趨向善良，強烈相信公平競爭，認為每個人都應該分享到秩序的益處。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 矮人約 4 到 5 呎高，重約 150 磅。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 速度[Speed]
entries: 你的速度不因穿載重甲而減低。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 矮人剛毅[Dwarven Resilience]
entries: 你的對抗毒素的豁免帶有優勢，你也對毒素傷害有抗力。

entries.name: 矮人戰鬥訓練[Dwarven Combat Training]
entries: 你熟練於使用戰斧[battleaxe]、手斧[handaxe]、輕鎚[light hammer]、戰鎚[warhammer]。

entries.name: 工具熟練
entries: 你熟練於自選的以下匠人工具之一：鐵匠工具[smith's tools]、釀酒工具[brewer's supplies]、建築工具[mason's tools]。

entries.name: 石藝[Stonecunning]
entries: 當要進行相關於石制品起源的智力（歷史） 檢定時，你視作熟練於歷史技能，並可以加上雙倍的熟練加值而非單倍。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能說、讀、寫通用語[Common]和矮人語[Dwarvish]。

entries.name: 矮人耐力[Dwarven Toughness]
entries: 你的生命值上限 +1，每當你升級時都再 +1。

entries.name: 護甲訓練[Dwarven Armor Training]
entries: 你熟練於輕甲和中甲。

entries.name: 高等黑暗視覺[Superior Darkvision]
entries: 120 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 灰矮人韌性[Duergar Resilience]
entries: 你的對抗毒素的豁免帶有優勢，你也對毒素傷害有抗力。 你在對抗幻術[illusions]和對抗會使你{@condition 迷惑[Charmed]}或者{@condition 麻痺[Paralyzed]}的豁免中得到優勢。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能說、讀、寫通用語[Common]和矮人語[Dwarvish]、地底通用語[Undercommon]。

entries.name: 灰矮人魔法[Duergar Magic]
entries: 當你到達3級時，你可以對自己施展一次變{@spell 變巨/縮小術[Enlarge/Reduce]}，但你只能選擇其中的變巨選項。當你到達5級時，你可以對自己施展一次{@spell 隱身[Invisibility]}法術。你無需滿足材料成分為這兩個法術，你不能在處於陽光直射時施展這些法術，雖然在你施展一旦施展它們以後陽光不會產生影響。你必須完成一次長休息才能再次從這個特性中施展這些法術。智力是你的施法主屬性。

entries.name: 日光敏感[Sunlight Sensitivity]
entries: 如果你本人，你要攻擊的目標，或者你試圖察覺到的東西位於陽光直射下，你在攻擊檢定和感知（觀察）檢定上獲得劣勢。

entries.name: Master of Locks
entries: When you make an Intelligence (History), Intelligence (Investigation), or Thieves' Tools check involving lock and trap mechanisms, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Wards and Seals
entries: You can use your mark to cast the {@spell alarm} spell as a ritual. Starting at 3rd level you can cast {@spell arcane lock} once with this trait and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 人類不到 20 歲就成年，很少活到 100 歲。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 人類並不偏向特定陣營。最好的人和最奸的人都在當中找得到。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 人類身高差距很大，由剛好 5 尺到遠超過 6 尺。不論你有多高，你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你能說、讀、寫通用語[common]和額外的一項自選語言。

entries.name: 技能[Skills]
entries: 你獲得一項你選擇的技能的熟練。

entries.name: 專長[Feat]
entries: 你獲得一個你選擇的專長。

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: Hunter's Intuition
entries: Your mark sharpens your senses and helps you find your prey. When you make a Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Survival) check, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Imprint Prey
entries: As a bonus action, choose one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The target is imprinted in your mind until it dies or you use this trait again. Alternatively, you can imprint a creature as your quarry whenever you succeed on a Wisdom (Survival) check to track it. When tracking your quarry, double the result of your Intuition die. When your quarry is within 60 feet of you, you have a sense of its location: it can't be hidden from you, gains no benefit from invisibility, and your attacks against it ignore half cover. Once you use this trait, you cannot use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Nature's Voice
entries: When you reach 3rd level you gain the ability to cast {@spell locate animals or plants}, but only as a ritual.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: Wild Intuition
entries: When you make a Wisdom (Animal Handling) or Intelligence (Nature) check, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Expert Handling
entries: You can use the Help action to aid an ally animal companion or mount within 30 feet of you, rather than 5 feet of you.

entries.name: Primal Connection
entries: You can cast {@spell animal friendship} once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

entries.name: The Bigger They Are
entries: When you cast a spell that affects only beasts, it also affects monstrosities with an Intelligence score of 3 or lower.

entries.name: Artisan's Intuition
entries: When you make an ability check with artisan's tools, roll 1d4 and add it to the result.

entries.name: Maker's Gift
entries: You know the cantrip {@spell mending} and gain proficiency with one type of artisan's tools.

entries.name: Magecraft
entries: You can create a temporary magic item out of common materials. Choose a cantrip from the wizard spell list. Describe the item connected to it. As long as you possess the item, you know that cantrip. At the end of a long rest, you can replace it with a new item and select a new cantrip from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these cantrips.

entries.name: Spellsmith
entries: You can spend one minute to weave a temporary enchantment into a nonmagical suit of armor or weapon. For the next hour the object becomes a magic item, gaining a +1 bonus to AC if it is armor or a +1 bonus to hit and damage if it is a weapon. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Courier's Speed
entries: Your base walking speed increases to 40 ft.

entries.name: Intuitive Motion
entries: When you make a Strength (Athletics) check or any ability check to operate or maintain a land vehicle, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Determined Stride
entries: When you use the Dash action, difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement on that turn.

entries.name: Shared Passage
entries: As a bonus action you can teleport a distance up to your walking speed, ending in an unoccupied space that you can see. You can bring one willing creature of your size or smaller who is carrying gear up to its carrying capacity. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you use this trait. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Sentinel's Intuition
entries: When you roll for Initiative or make a Wisdom (Perception) check to notice a threat, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add it to the ability check.

entries.name: Sentinel's Shield
entries: You know the cantrip {@spell blade ward}. You can cast {@spell shield} once with this trait and regain the ability to do so after you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Vigilant Guardian
entries: As an action, you can designate an ally you can see as your ward. You have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) and Wisdom (Perception) checks made to spot threats to your ward. In addition, when you are within 5 feet of your ward, and that creature is the target of an attack that you can see, you can use your reaction to swap places with your ward. When you do, you become the target of the attack.

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 半身人約 20 歲成年， 一般能活到 150 歲。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 大部分半身人都守序善良。他們一般心地善良、和藹可親，受不住看見他人受苦，完全不能容忍壓迫。他們也很守秩序、守傳統，倚重社群和習慣。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 半身人約 3 尺高，重約 40 磅。你的體型為小型。

entries.name: 幸運[Lucky]
entries: 當你在攻擊骰、能力檢定、豁免上投出 1 時，你可以重投它，但必需用新的結果。

entries.name: 勇敢[Brave]
entries: 你的對抗{@condition 恐慌[Frightened]}的豁免帶有優勢。

entries.name: 半身人的靈巧[Halfling Nimbleness]
entries: 你可以穿越任何體形比你大的生物所佔據的空間。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能說、讀、寫通用語[Common]和半身人語[Halfling]。

entries.name: 天生善匿[Naturally Stealthy]
entries: 當你從體形比自己大的生物獲得遮蔽時，你可以嘗試躲藏。

entries.name: 強魄壯體[Stout Resilience]
entries: 你的對抗毒素的豁免帶有優勢，你也對毒素傷害有抗力。

entries.name: 鬼靈言語[Silent Speech]
entries: 你可以向你30尺內的任何生物如同心靈感應般進行溝通。生物必須與你共同知曉一種語言才能理解你的發言。你通過這個方式每次只能和一名生物進行心靈溝通。

entries.name: Medical Intuition
entries: When you make a Wisdom (Medicine) check, you can roll one Intuition die, a d4, and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Healing Touch
entries: As an action, you can draw power from your dragonmark to spend one of your Hit Dice and revitalize yourself or a creature you touch. Roll the die, add your Wisdom modifier, and the creature regains a number of hit points equal to the total. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Innkeeper's Charms
entries: You know the cantrips {@spell friends} and {@spell prestidigitation}. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for them.

entries.name: Ever Hospitable
entries: When you make a Charisma (Persuasion) check or an ability check involving brewer's supplies or cook's utensils, you can roll one Intuition die (a d4) and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Size
entries: Shifters are about the same size as humans. Your size is Medium

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Your lycanthropic heritage grants you the ability to see in dark conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Shifting
entries: On your turn, you can shift as a bonus action. Shifting lasts for 1 minute or until you end it on your turn as a bonus action.
While shifting, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Constitution bonus (minimum of 1). You also gain a feature that depends on your shifter subrace, described below.
You must finish a short or long rest before you can shift again.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you can make an unarmed strike as a bonus action. You can use your Dexterity for its attack roll and damage bonus, and this attack deals slashing damage.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you gain advantage on all Wisdom-based checks and saving throws.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you gain a climb speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you can make a bite attack as an action. This is a melee weapon attack that uses Strength for its attack roll and damage bonus and deals 1d6 piercing damage. If this attack hits a target that is your size or smaller, the target is also {@condition grappled}.

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 魔人的壽命跟人類差不多，但可以多活個幾年。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 魔人雖然不會主動偏往邪惡，但許多往往步上邪惡。不管邪不邪惡，他們通常都屬於混亂。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 魔人體形跟人類差不多，你是中等體型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 煉獄抗性[Hellish Resistance]
entries: 你對火[fire]傷害有抗性。

entries.name: 語言
entries: 你能說、讀、寫通用語[Common]與煉獄語[Infernal]。

entries.name: 煉獄傳承[Infernal Legacy]
entries: 你可以使用 {@spell 奇術[Thaumaturgy]} 。 當你三等時，你可以用2環法術，一天一次施{@spell 煉獄叱喝[Hellish Rebuke]}。 當你五等時，你可以一天一次施{@spell 黑暗[darkness]}。這法術能力值為魅力。

entries.name: 外觀[Appearance]
entries: 你的魔人看起來或許和其他魔人很不一樣。取代玩家手冊裏你在外觀上的物理特徵，從以下特征中選擇 1d4 + 1 項：小型犄角，長或者鋒利的尖牙，分叉的舌頭，貓瞳，每只手上六根手指，山羊腿，偶蹄，分叉的尾巴，革狀或者帶鱗片的皮膚，紅色或者深藍色的皮膚，無法投下影子或者映像，發散出硫磺般的氣味。

entries.name: 煉獄傳承[Infernal Legacy]
entries: 你可以使用 {@spell 奇術[Thaumaturgy]} 。 當你三等時，你可以用2環法術，一天一次施{@spell 煉獄叱喝[Hellish Rebuke]}。 當你五等時，你可以一天一次施{@spell 黑暗[darkness]}。這法術能力值為魅力。

entries.name: 魔鬼之舌[Devil's Tongue]
entries: 你知曉 {@spell 公然侮辱[Vicious Mockery]} 戲法。當你到達3級時，你可以施展一次{@spell 迷惑人類[Charm Person]}為一個2環法術。當你到達5級時，你可以施展一次 {@spell 注目術[Enthrall]}。你必須完成一次長休息才能再次從這個特性中施展這些法術。魅力是你的施法主屬性。這個特性取代了煉獄傳承[Infernal Legacy]特性。

entries.name: 地獄之火[Hellfire]
entries: 當你達到3級時，你可以每天施展一次{@spell 燃燒之手[Burning Hands]}作為2環法術。這個特性取代了煉獄傳承[Infernal Legacy]特性中的{@spell 煉獄叱喝[Hellish Rebuke]}。

entries.name: 飛翼[Winged]
entries: 你的肩胛骨長出蝙蝠般的翅膀。在你沒有穿重型護甲時，你有30英尺的飛行速度。這個特性取代了煉獄傳承[Infernal Legacy]特性。

entries.name: Abyssal Arcana
entries: Each time you finish a long rest, you gain the ability to cast cantrips and spells randomly determined from a short list. At 1st level, you can cast a cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can also cast a 1st-level spell. At 5th level, you can cast a 2nd-level spell.

You can cast a spell gained from this trait only once until you complete your next long rest. You can cast a cantrip gained from this trait at will, as normal. For 1st-level spells whose effect changes if cast using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you cast the spell as if using a 2nd-level slot. Spells of 2nd level are cast as if using a 2nd-level slot

At the end of each long rest, you lose the cantrips and spells previously granted by this feature, even if you did not cast them. You replace those cantrips and spells by rolling for new ones on the Abyssal Arcana Spells table. Roll separately for each cantrip and spell. If you roll the same spell or cantrip you gained at the end of your previous long rest, roll again until you get a different result.

entries.name: Abyssal Fortitude
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by half your level (minimum 1).

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Abyssal.

entries.name: Infernal Legacy
entries: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell hellish rebuke} spell as a 2nd-level spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Once you reach 5th level, you can also cast the {@spell darkness} spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Maladomini
entries: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell ray of sickness} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell crown of madness} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Dis
entries: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell disguise self} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell invisibility} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Phlegethos
entries: You know the {@spell friends} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell charm person} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell suggestion} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Malbolge
entries: You know the {@spell minor illusion} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell disguise self} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell invisibility} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Stygia
entries: You know the {@spell ray of frost} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell armor of Agathys} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell darkness} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Minauros
entries: You know the {@spell mage hand} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell Tenser's floating disk} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell arcane lock} spell once with this trait, requiring no material component, and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Cania
entries: You know the {@spell mage hand} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell magic missile} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell web} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Avernus
entries: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell searing smite} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell branding smite} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Infernal Legacy
entries: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell hellish rebuke} spell as a 2nd-level spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Once you reach 5th level, you can also cast the {@spell darkness} spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Maladomini
entries: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell ray of sickness} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell crown of madness} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Dis
entries: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell disguise self} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell detect thoughts} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Phlegethos
entries: You know the {@spell friends} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell charm person} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell suggestion} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Malbolge
entries: You know the {@spell minor illusion} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell disguise self} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell invisibility} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Stygia
entries: You know the {@spell ray of frost} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell armor of Agathys} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell darkness} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Minauros
entries: You know the {@spell mage hand} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell Tenser's floating disk} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell arcane lock} spell once with this trait, requiring no material component, and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Cania
entries: You know the {@spell mage hand} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell burning hands} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell flame blade} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Avernus
entries: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell searing smite} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell branding smite} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 熊地精在16歲便成年，並可以活到80歲。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 熊地精忍受惡劣的生存環境，要求每個人保持自給自足，即使這要犧牲他們的同胞。他們往往是混亂邪惡。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 熊地精身高在6至8英尺之間，體重在250至350磅之間。你的體形為中型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 長肢[Long-Limbed]
entries: 當你在你的回合使用近戰攻擊時，你的觸及範圍增加5尺。

entries.name: 強壯身軀[[Powerful Build]
entries: 計算負重、推、提的時候你的身型算為大一號。

entries.name: 隱秘[Sneaky]
entries: 你熟練隱藏[Stealth]技能。

entries.name: 突襲攻擊[Surprise Attack]
entries: 如果你突襲一個目標並在戰鬥中的第一回合擊中了它，這次攻擊額外造成2d6傷害。此特性只能在每場戰鬥中使用一次。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你可以說、讀及寫通用語[​Common]和哥布林語[Goblin]。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 阿斯莫與人類成熟的速度相近，不過他們能活160年。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 充盈著天界之力，多數阿斯莫是善良的。被放逐的阿斯莫則通常是中立的甚至是邪惡的。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 阿斯莫的身高和體重與人類接近。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 天界抗性[Celestial Resistance]
entries: 你對光耀[radiant]和黯蝕[necrotic]傷害具有抗力。

entries.name: 治愈之手[Healing Hands]
entries: 以一個動作，你可以觸碰一個生物並使他恢復等同於你人物等級的生命值。一旦你使用了這個特性，在下次長休息完成之前你不能再次使用。

entries.name: 光輝掌者[Light Bearer]
entries: 你可以使用 {@spell 亮光[Light]} 。這法術能力值為魅力。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你能說，讀，寫通用語[Common]和天界語[Celestial]。

entries.name: 死靈壽衣[Necrotic Shroud]
entries: 從3級起，你可以使用一個動作來解放你內在的腐敗力量。你的眼睛將變為兩個漆黑的池，一對幽靈般的骨翅將從你的身後展開。在你進行轉變的同時，你周圍10尺內所有能看見你的生物必須通過魅力豁免檢定（DC=8+你的熟練值+你的魅力調整值），否則直到你的下回合結束之前他們將對你{@condition 恐慌[Frightened]}。
你的轉變持續一分鐘或直到你以一個附贈動作中止。在這期間，每個你的回合中一次，當你的攻擊或法術成功造成傷害，你將對一個目標造成額外的黯蝕傷害等同於你的人物等級。
一旦你使用這個特性，在下次長休息完成之前你不能再次使用。

entries.name: 光輝靈魂[Radiant Soul]
entries: 從3級起，你可以使用一個動作來釋放你內在的神聖能量。這將使你的眼睛閃爍，並且會有兩條輝煌的純能量光翼從你的後背延展。
你的轉變持續一分鐘或直到你以一個附贈動作中止。在這期間，你得到30尺的飛行速度，並且每個你的回合中一次，當你的攻擊或法術成功造成傷害，你將對一個目標造成額外的光耀傷害等同於你的人物等級。
一旦你使用這個特性，在下次長休息完成之前你不能再次使用。

entries.name: 光輝焚化[Radiant Consumption]
entries: 從3級起，你可以使用一個動作使你體內的神聖能量解除拘束。灼熱的光芒將以你為中心輻射，從你的口中和眼中湧動而出，只消頃刻就會將你焚毀。
你的轉變持續一分鐘或直到你以一個附贈動作中止。在這期間，明亮的光輝會照亮你周圍10尺並給予額外10尺的昏暗照明。並且，每個你的回合結束，你和你周圍10尺內的每個生物都將受到等同於你人物等級一半的光耀傷害（向上取整）。此外，每個你的回合中一次，當你的攻擊或法術成功造成傷害，你將對一個目標造成額外的光耀傷害等同於你的人物等級。
一旦你使用這個特性，在下次長休息完成之前你不能再次使用。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 作為與精類有關的類人生物，費爾伯格人有著悠長的壽命。一名費爾伯格人在30歲左右成年，他們中最年老的能活500年。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 為人遵循著大自然的節奏，並把他們自己看作是它的守護者，費爾伯格人通常是中立善良的。邪惡的費爾伯格人很罕見，而且一般是他們同族的死敵。

entries.name: 體型[Size]
entries: 費爾伯格人有7到8尺高，體重在240到300磅之間。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 費爾伯格魔法[Firbolg Magic]
entries: 你可以用這個特性施展{@spell 偵測魔法[Detect Magic]}和{@spell 自我易容[Disguise Self]}，使用感知作為你在施展它們時的施法屬性。一旦你施展了兩者中的任何一個法術，直到你完成一次短或長休息前都不能用這個特性再次施展它。當你施展這個版本的{@spell 自我易容[Disguise Self]}時，你可以看起來比平時矮3尺，讓你更容易融入人類與精靈之中。

entries.name: 神隱步[Hidden Step]
entries: 以一個附贈動作，你能如魔法般變為{@condition 隱形[Invisible]}，直到你的下一回合開始，或者直到你攻擊，進行一次傷害骰，或者強迫某人進行一次豁免檢定。一旦你使用了這個特性，直到你完成一次短或長休息前都不能再次使用它。

entries.name: 強壯身軀[[Powerful Build]
entries: 計算負重、推、提的時候你的身型算為大一號。

entries.name: 獸與葉之語[Speech of Beast and Leaf]
entries: 你有能力以有限的方式與野獸以及植物交流。它們可以理解你的話的意思，雖然你沒有特殊的能力來明白它們的回應。你在所有試圖影響它們的魅力檢定上有優勢。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你能說，讀，和寫通用語[Common]，精靈語[Elvish]，以及巨人語[Giant]。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 哥布林在8歲便成年，並可以活到60歲。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 哥布林是典型的中立邪惡，他們只在乎他們自己的須要。有少部分哥布林可能偏向中立或善良，但真的很少。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 哥布林身高在3至4英尺之間，體重在40至80磅之間。你的體形為小型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 小型生物的怒火[Fury of the Small]
entries: 當你對比你大型的生物使用攻擊或魔法，並造成傷害時，你可以對它造成額外傷害。這個額外傷害等同於你的等級。此特性在你完成一次短休息或長休息前無法再次使用。

entries.name: 敏捷逃脫[Nimble Escape]
entries: 哥布林可在自己的回合，以一個附贈動作進行撤離[Disengage]或者躲藏[Hide]動作。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你可以說、讀及寫通用語[Common]和哥布林語[Goblin]。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 大哥布林成年歲數與人類相仿，壽命亦與其相仿。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 大哥布林的社會是建立在一個忠於嚴格無情的行為準則的基礎之上。正因如此，他們往往是守序邪惡。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 大哥布林身高在5至6英尺之間，體重在150至200磅之間。你的體形為中型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 軍事訓練[Martial Training]
entries: 你熟練使用兩項你選擇的軍用武器[martial weapons]以及輕甲[light armor]。

entries.name: 挽回面子[Saving Face]
entries: 大哥布林因為害怕失去地位，小心亦亦地不在盟友面前顯示軟弱的一臉。如果你在一次攻擊檢定中打空了、能力檢定或豁免中失敗了，你將會獲得骰值加值，此次加值的數目等同於你30英尺內能見的友方數目（最多+5）。此特性在你完成一次短休息或長休息前無法再次使用。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你可以說、讀及寫通用語[Common]和哥布林語[Goblin]。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 天狗的壽命比起人類較短。他們在12歲左右成年，通常能活到60歲。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 天狗是混亂的生物，他們很少做長久的承諾，並且他們最關心的是保護自己的隱匿性。他們通常處於混亂中立陣營。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 天狗大約有5英尺高，體重在90磅至120磅之間，是中體形生物。

entries.name: 專家偽造[Expert Forgery]
entries: 你可以仿造其他生物的筆跡和工藝。你在為偽造文書和復制現存物體進行的任何檢定中獲得優勢。

entries.name: 天狗訓練[Kenku Training]
entries: 你從以下技能中選擇兩項獲得熟練：特技動作[Acrobatics]、欺瞞[Deception]、隱藏[Stealth]，以及巧手[Sleight of Hand]。

entries.name: 擬聲[Mimicry]
entries: 你可以模仿你聽到的聲音，包括人的嗓音。聽到聲音的生物需要通過一個感知（察言觀色）檢定來對抗你的魅力（欺瞞）檢定，若成功將發現是模仿的。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你可以讀寫通用語[Common]和氣族語[Auran]，但你只能使用你的擬聲特性來說話。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 狗頭人在6歲便成年，並可以活到120歲，不過少之有少。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 狗頭人從根本上是自私的存在，使他們邪惡，但他們依賴他們團結的力量使他們偏向守序。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 狗頭人身高在2至3英尺之間，體重在25至35磅之間。你的體形為小型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 搖尾乞憐[Grovel, Cower, and Beg]
entries: 在你的行動回合，你可以花費一個動作，可憐地蜷縮著以分散附近的敵人的註意。直到你下個回合結束時，你的友方在攻擊你十英尺之內的敵人時獲得攻擊檢定的優勢。此特性在你完成一次短休息或長休息前無法再次使用。

entries.name: 群體戰術[Pack Tactics]
entries: 如果你有至少一個盟友在目標生物5尺範圍內且非{@condition 乏力[Incapacitated]}，你在對抗該生物的攻擊檢定上則有優勢。

entries.name: 日光敏感[Sunlight Sensitivity]
entries: 如果你本人，你要攻擊的目標，或者你試圖察覺到的東西位於陽光直射下，你在攻擊檢定和感知（觀察）檢定上獲得劣勢。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你可以說、讀及寫通用語[Common]和龍語[Draconic]。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 蜥蜴人一般14歲成年，很少活到60歲以上。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 大多數蜥蜴人是中立的，他們認為這世界上只有捕食者和獵物，在這裏生死都只是自然的過程。他們的願望只有生存，和讓其他的生物落入他們的計劃。

entries.name: 遊泳速度[Swim Speed]
entries: 你擁有30尺遊泳速度。

entries.name: 啃咬[Bite]
entries: 你的尖牙是一件天生武器，可以用來進行徒手攻擊。如果你擊中了目標，你造成 1d6 + 你的力量調整值的穿刺[piercing]傷害，而不是普通徒手攻擊所造成的鈍擊[bludgeoning]傷害。

entries.name: 能工巧匠[Cunning Artisan]
entries: 作為一次短休息的一部分，你可以用從殺死的小型或更大的野獸、構裝生物、龍、怪獸，或者植物上獲取的骨頭獸皮制作以下一件物品：一面盾牌，一根棍棒，一支標槍，或者1d4支飛鏢或吹箭筒針。想要使用這個能力，你需要一把刀，例如一把匕首，或者合適的工匠工具，例如皮匠工具。

entries.name: 屏息[Hold Breath]
entries: 在上浮前你能屏住你的呼吸15分鐘。

entries.name: 獵人知識[Hunter's Lore]
entries: 你在以下技能中選擇兩項並獲得熟練：馴服動物[Animal Handling]，自然[Nature]，觀察[Perception]，隱藏[Stealth]和求生[Survival]。

entries.name: 自然護甲[Natural Armor]
entries: 你有著堅韌帶鱗的皮膚，當你沒有穿戴盔甲時，你的AC是13+你的敏捷調整值。如果你穿戴的盔甲給予你的AC較低，你可以用你的天生護甲來決定你的AC。你在使用你的天生護甲時，仍能獲得盾牌的好處。

entries.name: 饑渴之喉[Hungry Jaws]
entries: 在戰鬥中，你能讓你自己進入一種兇狠的暴食狀態。以一個附贈動作，你能用你的嚙咬攻擊做一次特殊攻擊，如果攻擊命中，造成正常的傷害，同時你獲得等同於你的體質調整值的臨時HP（至少1點）。在你完成一次短休息或長休息前，你不能再次使用該能力。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你能說、讀和寫通用語[Common]以及龍語[Draconic]。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 獸人在12歲便成年，並可以活到50歲。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 獸人是惡毒的掠奪者，他們相信這個世界應該屬於他們的。他們崇敬力量致上，並相信強者必須欺負弱者，以確保弱者不會像疾病一樣傳播。他們普遍是混亂邪惡。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 獸人身高普遍在6英尺以上，體重在230至280磅之間。你的體形為中型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 好鬥[Aggressive]
entries: 以一個附贈動作，獸人向一個可見的敵對生物移動至多相當於其速度的距離。你必須在結束這個移動時，比開始移動前更接近敵人。

entries.name: 威脅[Menacing]
entries: 你的威嚇[Intimidation]技能為熟練。

entries.name: 強壯身軀[Powerful Build]
entries: 計算負重、推、提的時候你的身型算為大一號。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你可以說、讀及寫通用語[Common]和獸人語[Orc]。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 斑貓人的壽命與人類相仿。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 斑貓人趨向於混亂陣營，他們讓沖動與幻想引導著他們的決定。他們很少有邪惡的，大多數斑貓人是被好奇心驅使著，而不是貪婪或者其他黑暗的沖動。

entries.name: 體型[Size]
entries: 斑貓人平均身高要比人類高，相對也更纖細。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 貓之迅捷[Feline Agility]
entries: 你的反應和敏捷允許你能以爆發性的速度移動。當你在戰鬥中移動時，你可以讓你的速度增加一倍，直到回合結束。一旦你使用了這個特性，除非你在你的一個回合中移動0尺，否則你不能再使用它。

entries.name: 貓之利爪[Cat's Claws]
entries: 因為你的爪子，你有20尺的攀爬速度。此外，你的利爪視為天生武器，你可以用它來進行徒手攻擊。如果擊中了目標，你造成的揮砍[slashing]傷害等於 1d4 + 你的力量調整值，而不是普通徒手攻擊所造成的鈍擊[bludgeoning]傷害。

entries.name: 貓之天性[Cat's Talents]
entries: You have proficiency in the Perception and Stealth skills.

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你能說、讀和寫通用語[Common]以及任意一門你自選的語言。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 梭螺魚人在15歲左右成年，能活到200歲。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 梭螺魚人傾向於守序善良。作為最黑暗海域的守護者，他們的文化把他們推向秩序和仁慈。

entries.name: 體型[Size]
entries: 梭螺魚人比人類稍矮，平均約5尺高。你的體型為中型。

entries.name: 遊泳速度[Swim Speed]
entries: 你擁有30尺的遊泳速度。

entries.name: 兩棲[Amphibious]
entries: 你能呼吸空氣和水。

entries.name: 控風操水
entries: 作為一位大海之子，你能呼喚氣元素和水元素的魔力。你可以用這個特性施展{@spell 雲霧術[Fog Cloud]} 。從3級開始，你能用它施展{@spell 造風術[Gust of Wind]}，從5級開始，你也能用它施展{@spell wall of water|xge}。一旦你用這個特性施展了一個法術，直到你完成一次長休息前都不能再這麽做。你的這些法術的施法能力值是魅力。

entries.name: 海之使者[Emissary of the Sea]
entries: 水生野獸與你的種族有著非凡的親和力。你可以與能在水中呼吸的野獸簡單溝通交流。它們能夠理解你的話的意思，雖然你沒有特殊的能力來明白它們的回應。

entries.name: 海淵守護者[Guardians of the Depths]
entries: 適應了哪怕是最極端的海洋深處，你獲得對寒冷傷害的抗力。你無視深水環境所造成的任何劣勢。

entries.name: Languages
entries: 你可以說，讀，寫通用語[Common]和原初語[Primordial]。

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 純種蛇人成年歲數與人類相仿，壽命亦與其相仿。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 純種蛇人缺乏感情，把別人看作工具來操作。他們很少關心守序或混亂，通常是中立邪惡。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 純種蛇人與人類的平均身高體重相同。你的體形為中型。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 天生施法[Innate Spellcasting]
entries: 你懂得{@spell 毒氣噴[Poison Spray]}戲法。你能夠無限次施展{@spell 動物之友[Animal Friendship]}，不過目標只能是蛇。從第三級開始，你能夠施展{@spell 暗示[Suggestion]}，一但你施展了它，在你完成一次短休息或長休息前無法再次使用。魅力是你的施法屬性。

entries.name: 魔法抗性[Magic Resistance]
entries: 對抗法術和其他魔法效果時你有豁免檢定的優勢。

entries.name: 免疫毒素[Poison Immunity]
entries: 你免疫中毒的傷害和{@condition 中毒[Poisoned]}狀態。

entries.name: 語言[Languages]
entries: 你可以說、讀及寫通用語[Common]、深淵語[Abyssal]和龍語[Draconic]。

entries.name: Size
entries: Changelings are built much like humans, but a little leaner. Your size is Medium

entries.name: Duplicity
entries: You gain proficiency in the Deception skill.

entries.name: Shapechanger
entries: As an action, you can polymorph into any humanoid of your size that you have seen, or back into your true form. However, your equipment does not change with you. If you die, you revert to your natural appearance.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.

entries.name: Size
entries: Warforged are generally broader and heavier than humans. Your size is Medium

entries.name: Composite Plating
entries: Your construction incorporates wood and metal, granting you a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

entries.name: Living Construct
entries: Even though you were constructed, you are a living creature. You are immune to disease. You do not need to eat or breathe, but you can ingest food and drink if you wish.

Instead of sleeping, you enter an inactive state for 4 hours each day. You do not dream in this state; you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Revenant Subrace
entries: Having met a cruel and undeserved end, you have returned to the realm of the living. As a revenant, you thirst for revenge against those who wronged you in life, or seek to complete a final, critical task you left unfinished.

The revenant subrace can be applied to any race that has a subrace, and replaces that race's existing subrace options. Alternatively, you can apply this new subrace to a race without subrace options using the modification options provided below.

Your DM might also allow you to take this subrace for a slain character. In that case, your character rises from the dead with its original subrace replaced (or with the necessary modifications made to its base traits), filled with a determination to seek vengeance or complete its mission.

entries.name: Racial Adjustments
entries: For races that don't have subrace options, taking on the revenant subrace means making changes to your character's base traits, as follows. (This playtest article provides options only for human and dragonborn characters. Any other races which do not have subrace options should not be used with these revenant subrace rules.)

entries.name: Human Revenant
entries: If you want to play a human revenant, modify the human's Ability Score Increase trait to the following: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1. If you use the variant human traits, remove the Skills trait and the Feat trait.

entries.name: Dragonborn Revenant
entries: If you want to play a dragonborn revenant, modify the dragonborn's Ability Score Increase trait to the following: Your Strength score increases by 1, and your Charisma score increases by 1. Additionally, your Draconic Ancestry trait uses necrotic damage as its damage type, replacing the damage type that applies to your breath weapon and your damage resistance.

entries.name: Tiefling Revenant
entries: A prior installment of Unearthed Arcana (That Old Black Magic) outlined two tiefling variants that make use of subraces. Use that article to make a tiefling revenant, replacing the subrace options with the revenant subrace options. The base tiefling traits from the article are as follows:

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma score increases by 2.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: Relentless Nature
entries: Your DM assigns a goal to you—typically, one related to your character's death. The goal must be a specific task you can complete, such as slaying an enemy or liberating an area and its people. Until you fulfill that goal, you gain the following benefits:

items: If you are below half your hit point maximum at the start of your turn, you regain 1 hit point.

If you die, you return to life 24 hours after death. If your body is destroyed, you reform within 1 mile of the place of your death at a spot determined by the DM. If your equipment was also destroyed, you do not regain it.

You know the distance and direction between you and any creature involved in your goal, such as a person you seek vengeance against or someone you pledged to defend. This awareness fails if the creature is on another plane of existence.

entries: When your goal is complete, you finally find rest. You die and cannot be restored to life.

entries.name: Age
entries: Minotaurs enter adulthood at around the age of 17 and can live up to 150 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Minotaurs believe in a strict code of honor, and thus tend toward law. They are loyal to the death and make implacable enemies, even as their brutal culture and disdain for weakness push them toward evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Minotaurs typically stand well over 6 feet tall and weigh an average of 300 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Conqueror's Virtue
entries: From a young age, you focused on one of the three virtues of strength, cunning, or intellect. Your choice of your Strength, Intelligence, or Wisdom score increases by 1.

entries.name: Horns
entries: You are never unarmed. You are proficient with your horns, which are a melee weapon that deals 1d10 piercing damage. Your horns grant you advantage on all checks made to shove a creature, but not to avoid being shoved yourself.

entries.name: Goring Rush
entries: When you use the Dash action during your turn, you can make a melee attack with your horns as a bonus action.

entries.name: Hammering Horns
entries: When you use the Attack action during your turn to make a melee attack, you can attempt to shove a creature with your horns as a bonus action. You cannot use this shove attempt to knock a creature {@condition prone}.

entries.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: You can perfectly recall any path you have traveled.

entries.name: Sea Reaver
entries: You gain proficiency with navigator's tools and vehicles (water).

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: Age
entries: Merfolk mature at the same rate humans do and reach adulthood around the age of 20. They live considerably longer than humans, though, often reaching well over 100 years.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Size
entries: Merfolk are about the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Swimming
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Merfolk, and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the bard spell list. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Creed of the Trickster
entries: You have proficiency in the Sleight of Hand and Stealth skills.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the druid spell list. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Wind Creed Manipulation
entries: You have proficiency in the Deception and Persuasion skills.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Water Creed Navigation
entries: You have proficiency with navigator tools and in the Survival skill.

entries.name: Age
entries: Goblins mature faster than humans, reaching adulthood at around age 12. They also age noticeably faster than humans, and even the most cautious goblins rarely live longer than 50 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most goblins are wildly chaotic, though they have no particular inclination toward good or evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Goblins average about 3 feet tall and weigh about 40 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Grit
entries: You have resistance to fire damage and psychic damage. In addition, when you are wearing no armor, your AC is equal to 11 + your Dexterity modifier.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: Grogtag Tamer
entries: You have proficiency in the Animal Handling skill.

entries.name: Lavastep Grit
entries: You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky or subterranean environments.

entries.name: Tuktuk Cunning
entries: You have proficiency with thieves' tools.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kor mature at the same rate as humans and live about as long.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most kor are lawful good, with a strong dedication to community and the traditions of their ancestors.

entries.name: Size
entries: Kor average nearly 6 feet tall, but are much lighter and more slender than humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Brave
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

entries.name: Climbing
entries: You also have a climbing speed of 30 feet as long as you are not encumbered or wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: Kor Climbing
entries: You have proficiency in the Athletics and Acrobatics skills.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, and communicate in the silent speech of the Kor.

entries.name: Lucky
entries: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

entries.name: Age
entries: Vampires don't mature and age in the same way that other races do. Every living vampire is either a bloodchief, infected by Ulamog's influence in the distant reaches of history, or was spawned by a bloodchief from a living human. Most vampires are thus very old, but few have any memory of their earliest years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Vampires have no innate tendency toward evil, but consuming the life energy of other creatures often pushes them to that end. Regardless of their moral bent, the strict hierarchies of their bloodchiefs inclines them toward a lawful alignment.

entries.name: Size
entries: Vampires are about the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Blood Thirst
entries: You can drain blood and life energy from a willing creature, or one that is {@condition grappled} by you, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. Make a melee attack against the target. If you hit, you deal 1 piercing damage and 1d6 necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and you regain hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid killed in this way becomes a null (see "Zendikar Bestiary").

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Vampire.

entries.name: Vampiric Resistance
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

entries.name: Age
entries: Aetherborn come into being as adults and live no more than a few years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: As a rule, aetherborn are driven by hedonism and self-interest, making them neutral at best

entries.name: Size
entries: Aetherborn are about the same size as humans, ranging from 5 to 6 feet tall. They are quite light—only about 100 pounds—and their weight diminishes as they age and more and more of their substance returns to the aethersphere. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Born of Aether
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: You have proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.

entries.name: Gift of the Aetherborn
entries: An unknown aetherborn, desperately seeking a means to extend their short life, discovered a process of transformation that prolonged their existence—by giving them the ability to feed on the life essence of other beings. Since then, other aetherborn have learned and carried out this monstrous transformation, and aetherborn with this "gift" have become a small minority among an already small population.

A gifted aetherborn has the ability to drain the life essence of other beings. Similar to the way heat is transferred from a warm object to a cold one, a gifted aetherborn need only touch another living being with a clawed hand to draw life essence out, fueling their own continued existence while draining strength and vitality from their victim.

For many aetherborn, living as they do for indulgence and instant gratification, the concepts of "want" and "need" are virtually synonymous. But Aetherborn with this gift understand what it is to truly need, for they develop a hunger for life essence that far exceeds any desires they might have felt before their transformation. A gifted aetherborn who abstains from this feeding deteriorates even more rapidly than other aetherborn, while enduring unspeakable agony caused by the deprivation of life energy.

At the DM's option, an aetherborn character can research methods of achieving this dark "gift." The process is similar to inventing and manufacturing a rare magic item (see "Inventing and Manufacturing Devices" earlier in this document). But rather than aether, the process requires a variety of rare unguents and unusual ingredients that make up the cost of researching and undergoing the transformation.

An aetherborn with this gift gains the Drain Life ability: a natural attack that deals 1d6 necrotic damage and restores the same number of hit points to the aetherborn. However, if the aetherborn goes for 7 days without dealing this damage, their hit point maximum is reduced by 1d6 per week. This reduction can't be removed until the aetherborn has used their Drain Life ability and completed a long rest.

entries.name: Age
entries: Dwarves mature at the same rate as humans, but they're considered young until they reach the age of 50. On average, they live about 350 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most dwarves are lawful, believing firmly in the benefits of a well-ordered society. They tend toward good as well, with a strong sense of fair play and a belief that everyone deserves to share in the benefits of a just order.

entries.name: Size
entries: Dwarves stand around 5 feet tall and average about 150 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your speed is not reduced by wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Accustomed to life underground in your race's ancient past, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

entries.name: Dwarven Toughness
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

entries.name: Artisan's Expertise
entries: You gain proficiency with two kinds of artisan's tools of your choice. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies. In addition, whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of any architectural construction (including buildings, public works such as canals and aqueducts, and the massive cogwork that underlies much of the construction of Ghirapur), you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Dwarvish. Dwarvish is full of hard consonants and guttural sounds, and those characteristics spill over into whatever other language a dwarf might speak.

entries.name: Age
entries: Vedalken mature at the same rate humans do, and most are expected to settle down into an adult life by around age 40. They can live 350 to almost 500 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Vedalken are most often lawful and rarely evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Vedalken are taller than humans but more slender. They average 6 to 6½ feet tall, but usually weigh less than 200 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Vedalken Cunning
entries: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

entries.name: Aether Lore
entries: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to magic items or aether-powered technological devices, you can add twice your proficiency bonus, instead of any proficiency bonus you normally apply.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Vedalken. The Vedalken language is renowned for its technical treatises and its catalogs of knowledge about the natural world and the aether that pervades it.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Humans tend toward no particular alignment.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your ability scores each increase by 1.

entries.name: Forest Folk
entries: You have proficiency in the Survival skill.

entries.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Your base walking speed is 40 feet.

entries.name: Sure-footed
entries: When you use the Dash action, difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement on that turn.

entries.name: Spring Attack
entries: When you make a melee attack against a creature, you don't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of your turn, whether you hit or not.

entries.name: Breadth of Knowledge
entries: You gain proficiency in any combination of four skills or with four tools of your choice.

entries.name: Daunting
entries: You have proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

entries.name: Tough
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by 2, and it increases by 2 every time you gain a level.

entries.name: 年齡[Age]
entries: 阿斯莫與人類成熟的速度相近，不過他們能活160年。

entries.name: 陣營[Alignment]
entries: 充盈著天界之力，多數阿斯莫是善良的。被放逐的阿斯莫則通常是中立的甚至是邪惡的。

entries.name: 體形[Size]
entries: 阿斯莫的身高和體重與人類接近。

entries.name: 黑暗視覺[Darkvision]
entries: 60 尺以內的微光對你而言如同亮光，黑暗如同微光。你在黑暗中無法分清顏色，只能看到灰色的影子。

entries.name: 天界抗性[Celestial Resistance]
entries: 你對光耀[radiant]和黯蝕[necrotic]傷害具有抗力。

entries.name: 天界傳承[Celestial Legacy]
entries: 你可以使用 {@spell 亮光[Light]} 。 當你三等時，你可以用2環法術，一天一次施{@spell 次級復原[Lesser Restoration]}。 當你五等時，你可以一天一次施{@spell 晝明術[Daylight]}。這法術能力值為魅力。

entries.name: 語言[Language]
entries: 你能說，讀，寫通用語[Common]和天界語[Celestial]。

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens. Most human initiates have completed the trials and found a glorious or inglorious death before they turn 30. Viziers can enjoy longer service to their gods, in theory living up to a century.

entries.name: Alignment
